description: This file defines the AdminMenuManagementScreen widget for the admin menu management interface in a Flutter app. It includes UI components such as headers, items, and responsive layouts, primarily serving as a stub or placeholder for actual functionality in a larger application.

classes.name: AdminMenuManagementScreen

classes.name: _Item
classes.description: A stateless widget representing individual items or placeholders within the menu management screen.
